product_overview: DWx Policy Manager is a comprehensive enterprise-grade policy lifecycle management system within the DWx suite, enabling policy creation, distribution, acknowledgement tracking, compliance reporting, and audit readiness with multi-role support and advanced analytics.
core_goals: Provide end-to-end policy lifecycle management from authoring to archival.
Facilitate multi-role support including employees, HR managers, policy authors, administrators, and compliance officers.
Automate policy distribution, acknowledgement workflows, and escalation processes.
Ensure compliance with regulatory standards (GDPR, SOX, ISO 27001) including immutable audit trails.
Deliver comprehensive analytics and reporting for compliance and engagement.
Support integration with Microsoft 365 and DWx suite components for seamless operations.
key_features: Policy Hub: Central library for browsing, searching, and filtering organizational policies.
My Policies Dashboard: Personalized employee portal to view assigned policies and acknowledgement status.
Policy Authoring Interface: Rich text editing with templates and workflow management for policy creation and versioning.
Administrative Dashboard: Manage policies, users, approvals, exemptions, and system configurations.
Comprehension Quiz System: Create, assign, and take quizzes to validate policy understanding.
Policy Packs: Group related policies for bundled distribution and management.
Acknowledgement Workflows: Multi-step tracking with digital signatures, read receipts, and audit logs.
Advanced Analytics: Real-time dashboards, compliance scoring, predictive insights, and report exports.
Exemption Management: Request, review, and approve policy exemptions with compensating controls.
Security & Compliance: Role-based access, encrypted storage, multi-factor authentication, and tamper-proof records.
Automated Notifications: Email and Teams alerts, reminders, and escalations.
Integration: Azure AD, Microsoft Graph, SharePoint storage, Power Automate workflows.
user_flow_summary: Employee logs into My Policies dashboard to view and acknowledge assigned policies; can take comprehension quizzes where required.
Policy Authors create or update policies using the authoring interface, submit for review and approval workflows.
HR Managers and Policy Administrators review, approve, distribute policies and monitor compliance through dashboards.
Compliance Officers generate audit reports, monitor regulatory mapping, and assess compliance risks.
Users request exemptions which flow through review and approval workflows with audit tracking.
System auto-assigned policies based on role/department with automated reminders and escalation for overdue acknowledgements.
validation_criteria: All SharePoint lists and components provisioned and configured correctly.
Policy CRUD, lifecycle transitions, versioning, and acknowledgement workflows operate as expected.
Multi-role access controls enforce appropriate permissions and data visibility.
Compliance audit trails are complete, immutable, and exportable for external audits.
Policy quizzes validate comprehension with analytics and retake limitations.
Dashboards correctly display real-time compliance metrics and user engagement.
Automated notifications, reminders, and escalation workflows trigger timely and accurate communications.
System performance meets page load targets (< 2 seconds) and supports mobile responsive design.
Security features including encrypted storage and multi-factor authentication function reliably.
Integration points with Microsoft 365 and DWx suite components operate seamlessly.
